article_title: Israel agrees to pauses in fighting for polio vaccine drive
sentence: Israel  launched  a  military  campaign  in  Gaza  in  response  to  an  unprecedented  attack  on  southern  Israel  on  7  October  by  Hamas,  during  which  about  1,200  people  were  killed  and  251  taken  hostage.

article_title: Israel agrees to pauses in fighting for polio vaccine drive
sentence: More  than  40,530  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  7  October,  according  to  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
